DEVELOPING WEB APPLICATIONS IN TODAY'S WORLD IS NO EASY TASK.
IT REQUIRES SKILL, DETERMINATION
and the right tools for the job.
In the 1900s, you could launch a web site with a handful of text files and a few CGI scripts. But times have changed and modern problems require modern solutions.
That's why Solutious Incorporated is dedicated to building the best tools money can't buy. We help you get the job done, and done right.

Stella

DID SOMEONE SAY TESTING?

Test performance with beauty and brute strength

Now in private beta Follow on GitHub

Stella is a testing tool. You define your testplans using a powerful Ruby DSL (domain specific language) and Stella takes care of the rest.

Rudy

Not your granparents' deployment tool

Not your granparents' deployment tool

Now in private beta Follow on GitHub

Rudy is a staging and deployment tool. You define your environments using a powerful Ruby DSL (domain specific language) and Rudy takes care of the rest.
